description:
He points at the line which to me resembles 2045/2050. The show is indicating when the Singularity events shall unfold. The time when man finally merges himself with machine by uploading ones consciousness into the cloud. This is far from science-fiction.... at least to those like Ray Kurzweil who have been promoting this transhumanist agenda for some time now. I find this clip extremely interesting as the whole transhumanist ideology is that we are some kind of cosmic accident, we’re complete innate beings with no “special” attainments, no spiritual or enlightened expressions. Just an accident. Of course, this fits nicely with the evolutionist ideas - ideas The Big Bang Theory are heavily promoting.what are your thoughts friends?⬇️
